vectorData.altText: Identify the structures outlined. Be specific.
That's right! Medullary rays are identifiable by their straight course through the renal cortex between the renal corpuscles.
That is incorrect. Click here      to learn the answer, then come back to try again.
MR – Medullary rays, parallel arrays of tubules between the cortex and medulla that contain straight tubules and collecting ducts
H16   The Gross Structure of the Kidney II
